game.name: Desktop Dog Park
game.shortDescription: A chill desktop idle game where you build and decorate a dog park at the bottom of your screen. Collect coins, unlock new dog breeds, feed and play with them, hire an attendant, and watch your park grow while you work on other things.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A chill desktop idle game where you build and decorate a dog park at the bottom of your screen. Collect coins, unlock new dog breeds, feed and play with them, hire an attendant, and watch your park grow while you work on other things.
